extension.summary: Watch NHK World Japan in HD - live stream, on-demand and news programs
extension.description:
Watch NHK World Japan in HD
- Live Stream - On demand programs - By program, latest and most watched and categories. You can also browse and search through all programs. - Live schedule - Top Stories and At a Glance - News programs like NEWSLINE, NEWSLINE IN DEPTH and NEWSROOM TOKYO
Content is retrieved and played directly from the NHK World web site.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is a fan project and not related in any way to NHK!
extension.news: v1.2.0 - Removed Playlists section - Changed Live stream to 720P as well - Support for the new NHK streaming infrastructure - Unfortunately, On-demand episodes now only play in 720p instead of 1080p
